sense.gloss: imperial palace (esp. Kyoto Imperial Palace), imperial residence, residence of a shogun, minister, etc.
emperor, ex-emperor, empress, imperial prince, shogun, minister

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑京都|↑↓きょうと↓↑御所|↑↓ごしょ↓に↑連↑↓つ↓れて↑行↑↓い↓きました。
sdata.e: I took him to the Kyoto Imperial Palace.
